name: GetEventNotificationConfigurationsByPayrollAdministrationId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetEventNotificationConfigurationsByPayrollAdministrationId

Get a list of the notification configurations for certain events for an employer. Currently its only posible to configure email recipients for an event notification.

__Note:__ Event notifications can be configured on payroll administration and provider level. This endpoint returns the provider level value if no value exists on the payroll administration level and if neither level has a value an empty event is returned.
